page.title: 15ASLACKBY-EMPLOYMENT & TRANS.
page.content: weekly. A fishmonger comes rather more infrequently, as does the coalmerchant. A log merchant comes when required. A grocer and green grocer also come. The green grocer lives above his store which is on the A15 main road as you travel towards Rippingale. It is next to a garage. {TRANSPORT} A National bus service runs twice daily to London, about 100 miles. Independent bus companies run people to the various surrounding market towns. Kimes, at Folkingham are 3 miles from Aslackby. Delaine at Bourne are 7 miles away. Wings at Sleaford is about 11 miles away. They take people to Grantham, 15 miles away, Bourne, 7, Sleaford, 11 and Boston, 25 miles away from Aslackby.
